id: Notion Template: A Virtual Study/Work Café with Pomodoro, Music Widgets, etc
name: Notion Template: A Virtual Study/Work Café with Pomodoro, Music Widgets, etc
description: Watch this video to set up your own customised virtual café template:Inspired by study websites like imissmycafe.com and lifeat.io, I created this virtual café in Notion. It contains a Pomodoro timer, Spotify playlists of focus music, and a short planning and mindset reframing section for a more productive study or work session.For personal use only. Psst! This template is listed as 'pay as you like' to be accessible to as many people as possible. You're welcome to download it for free, or if yo
